Html:
Hi,

when I try to run the application it tries to open C:\SubSonic 2.0.3\src\SubSonic\DataProviders\SqlDataProvider.cs. and then when I click open it generates following.

the file C:\SubSonic 2.0.3\src\SubSonic\DataProviders\SqlDataProvider.cs does not exist

appriciate any help thank you

If I click on close it genereates following:

An attempt to attach an auto-named database for file C:\Users\Zack\Documents\ClubSK\ClubStarterKit\ClubStarterKit.Web\App_Data\ClubDB.mdf failed.
A database with the same name exists, or specified file cannot be opened, or it is located on UNC share.
